description: A classic number puzzle game where you slide tiles to combine numbers and reach the 2048 tile. Perfect for developing logical thinking and strategic planning skills.

howToPlay: Use arrow keys or swipe to move tiles in any direction
When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one
Try to reach the 2048 tile to win the game
Keep playing to achieve even higher scores

controls.keyboard: Arrow keys to move tiles in four directions
controls.mouse: Click and drag to swipe tiles
controls.touch: Swipe in any direction to move tiles

tips: Keep your highest number in one corner
Build numbers in ascending order along edges
Don't move your highest tile unless necessary

introduction: 2048 is the addictive number puzzle game that challenges players to combine tiles and reach the elusive 2048 tile. This mathematical brain teaser improves logical thinking, pattern recognition, and strategic planning skills.
features: Score tracking and personal best records
learningObjectives: Develop strategic thinking and planning skills
Practice mental math and number relationships
